properties.areaDesc: DeSoto, MS; Crittenden, AR; Shelby, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 3:38PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River at Memphis.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Memphis
* from Wednesday January 22 until Wednesday January 22.
* At 3 PM Tuesday the stage was...29.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.0 feet on Wednesday January 22.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
At 34.0 feet, In Arkansas, the camp on Robinson Road right inside the
levee is totally flooded. Roads to industries inside the levee south
of West Memphis are flooding..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
